name: Debug Quest (itch)
description:
The ancient machine that provides for your people stopped working. You must repair it and bring it back online.


Controls

  • Move: WASD, Arrow keys
  • Jump: W, Space
  • Attack / Interact: Z

Made by:

Robert "Nuthen" Piepsney

Simon Ando Chim (simonmakesgames.com)

Cameron "Ikroth" McHenry (camchenry.com)
